00008  * included derived classes depending on storage-method 
00009  */
00010 if (!defined('SESSION_STORAGE')) {
00011          require (LIB . 'controllers' . DS . 'components' . DS . 'file.session.php');
00012 } else {
00013          require (LIB . 'controllers' . DS . 'components' . DS . strtolower(SESSION_STORAGE) . '.session.php');
00014 }

00016 /**
00017  * base session class
00018  * 
00019  * @author feldkamp@gameforge.de
00020  * @author joachim.eckert@gameforge.de
00021  * @package kata_component
00022  */
00023 class baseSessionComponent {
00024          /**
00025           * placeholder for controller that owns this component
00026           * @var object
00027           */
00028          public $controller = false;
00029 
00030          /**
00031           * array of strings of component-names this component needs to function. null or false if none.
00032           * @var array
00033           */
00034          public $components = array ();
00035 
00036          /**
00037           * path that we use when we set the cookie
00038           * @var string
00039           */
00040          protected $path;
00041 
00042          /**
00043           * domain that we use when we set the cookie
00044           * @var string
00045           */
00046          protected $domain;
00047 
00048          /**
00049           * useragent that we use when we set/check a session-cookie
00050           * @var string
00051           */
00052          protected $userAgent = null;
00053 
00054          /**
00055           * time that we use when we check a session cookie
00056           * @var int
00057           */
00058          protected $time = null;
00059 
00060          /**
00061           * time after that the session expires (normally time+SESSION_TIMEOUT, as set in config/core.php)
00062           * @var int
00063           */
00064          protected $sessionTime = 0;
00065 
00066          /**
00067           * perform needed initialization and cache the controller that called us
00068           */
00069          public function startup(& $controller) {
00070                   if (!defined('SESSION_UNSAFE')) {
00071                            define('SESSION_UNSAFE', false);
00072                   }
00073 
00074                   $this->controller = $controller;
00075                   if (CLI) {
00076                            return;
00077                   }
00078          }
00079 
00080          function constructParams() {
00081                   //already constructed?
00082                   if (null !== $this->time) {
00083                            return;
00084                   }
00085 
00086                   if (!defined('SESSION_BASEDOMAIN') || (!SESSION_BASEDOMAIN)) {
00087                            $this->domain = env('SERVER_NAME');
00088                   } else {
00089                            $parts = explode('.', env('SERVER_NAME'));
00090                            while (count($parts) > 2) {
00091                                     array_shift($parts);
00092                            }
00093                            $this->domain = '.' . implode('.', $parts);
00094                   }
00095 
00096                   if (empty ($this->controller->basePath)) {
00097                            $this->path = '/';
00098                   } else {
00099                            $this->path = $this->controller->basePath;
00100                   }
00101 
00102                   $this->time = time();
00103                   if (SESSION_TIMEOUT > 0) {
00104                            $this->sessionTime = $this->time + SESSION_TIMEOUT;
00105                   } else {
00106                            $this->sessionTime = 0;
00107                   }
00108 
00109                   if (env('HTTP_USER_AGENT') != null) {
00110                            $this->userAgent = md5(env('HTTP_USER_AGENT') . (!SESSION_UNSAFE ? $this->getIp() : '') . SESSION_STRING);
00111                   } else {
00112                            $this->userAgent = md5((!SESSION_UNSAFE ? $this->getIp() : '') . SESSION_STRING);
00113                   }
00114          }
00115 
00116          /**
00117           * did we already initialize the session?
00118           * @var boolean
00119           */
00120          private $didInitSession = false;
00121 
00122          /**
00123                    * setting some ini-parameters and starting the actual session. is done lazy (only when needed)
00124                    * @param $forRead boolean if true we dont initialize the session if no sessioncookie exists
00125                    */
00126          protected function initSession($forRead) {
00127                   if ($this->didInitSession) {
00128                            return true;
00129                   }
00130 
00131                   if ($forRead) {
00132                            if (!isset ($_COOKIE[SESSION_COOKIE]) || empty ($_COOKIE[SESSION_COOKIE])) {
00133                                     return false;
00134                            }
00135                   }
00136 
00137                   $this->constructParams();
00138                   $this->startupSession();
00139                   $this->didInitSession = true;
00140                   $this->checkValid();
00141                   return true;
00142          }
00143 
00144          protected function initSessionParams() {
00145                   ini_set('url_rewriter.tags', '');
00146                   ini_set('session.use_cookies', 1);
00147                   ini_set('session.name', SESSION_COOKIE);
00148                   ini_set('session.cookie_lifetime', SESSION_TIMEOUT);
00149                   ini_set('session.gc_maxlifetime', SESSION_TIMEOUT + 1);
00150                   ini_set('session.cookie_path', $this->path);
00151                   ini_set('session.cookie_domain', $this->domain);
00152          }
00153 
00154          protected function initCookie() {
00155                   session_cache_limiter("must-revalidate");
00156                   header('P3P: CP="NOI ADM DEV PSAi COM NAV OUR OTRo STP IND DEM"');
00157          }
00158 
00159          protected function clearCookie() {
00160                   setcookie(SESSION_COOKIE, '', time() - DAY, $this->path, $this->domain);
00161          }
00162 
00163          /**
00164           * check if the session expired, or something suspicious happend
00165           */
00166          protected function checkValid() {
00167                   if (!is_null($this->read('SessionConfig'))) {
00168                            if ($this->userAgent == $this->read('SessionConfig.userAgent') && (($this->read('SessionConfig.time') == 0) || ($this->time <= $this->read('SessionConfig.time')))) {
00169                                     $this->write('SessionConfig.time', $this->sessionTime);
00170                            } else {
00171                                     // session hijacking
00172                                     $this->destroy();
00173                            }
00174                   } else {
00175                            srand((double) microtime() * 1000000);
00176                            $this->write('SessionConfig', 1);
00177                            $this->write('SessionConfig.userAgent', $this->userAgent);
00178                            $this->write('SessionConfig.time', $this->sessionTime);
00179                            $this->write('SessionConfig.rand', rand());
00180                   }
00181          }
00182 
00183          /**
00184           * checks if you used a valid string  as identifier
00185           * @param string $name may contain a-z, A-Z, 0-9, ._-
00186           */
00187          protected function validateKeyName($name) {
00188                   if (is_string($name) && preg_match("/^[0-9a-zA-Z._-]+$/", $name)) {
00189                            return;
00190                   }
00191                   throw new InvalidArgumentException("'$name' is not a valid session string identifier");
00192          }
00193 
00194          /**
00195           * check obvious conditions for all operations
00196           * 
00197           * @param string $name name under which the value(s) are to find
00198           * @param bool $forRead if we initialize for write (read: if we need to create a session if non-existing)
00199           * @return bool success
00200           */
00201          protected function preamble($name = null, $forRead = true) {
00202                   if (CLI) {
00203                            return false;
00204                   }
00205                   if (empty ($name)) {
00206                            return false;
00207                   }
00208                   $this->validateKeyName($name);
00209                   return $this->initSession($forRead);
00210          }
00211 
00212          /**
00213           * try to do an educated guess about the users real ip, even if he is behind proxies
00214           * 
00215           * @return string ip or '0.0.0.0' if failure
00216           */
00217          public function getIp() {
00218                   foreach (array (
00219                                     'HTTP_CLIENT_IP',
00220                                     'HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR',
00221                                     'HTTP_X_FORWARDED',
00222                                     'HTTP_FORWARDED_FOR',
00223                                     'HTTP_FORWARDED',
00224                                     'HTTP_X_COMING_FROM',
00225                                     'HTTP_COMING_FROM',
00226                                     'REMOTE_ADDR'
00227                            ) as $envvar) {
00228                            $ip = env($envvar);
00229                            if (!empty ($ip)) {
00230                                     return $ip;
00231                            }
00232                   }
00233                   return '0.0.0.0';
00234          }
